SQL.LOAD: SELECT PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_GROUP_ID, PRODUCT_CODE_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY FROM elp_product_group_detail WHERE product_group_detail_id = :product_group_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT pgd.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID, pgd.PRODUCT_CODE_ID, pgd.CREATED_BY, pgd.CREATED_DATE, pgd.MODIFIED_BY, pgd.MODIFIED_DATE, pc.DESCRIPTION, pgd.PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL_ID FROM elp_product_group_detail pgd, elp_product_code pc WHERE pgd.PRODUCT_CODE_ID = pc.PRODUCT_CODE_ID AND pgd.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = :PRODUCT_GROUP_ID
SQL.LOAD_PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST: SELECT pgd.product_group_id, pgd.product_code_id, pgd.created_by, pgd.created_date, pgd.modified_by, pgd.modified_date, pg.product_group_name, pgd.product_group_detail_id FROM elp_product_group_detail pgd, elp_product_group pg WHERE pgd.product_group_id = pg.product_group_id AND pgd.product_code_id = :product_code_id
SQL.LOAD_GROUP_PRODUCT_CODE_IDs: SELECT product_code_id FROM elp_product_group_detail WHERE product_group_id = :product_group_id
SQL.LOAD_ALL_GROUP_PRODUCT_CODE_IDs: SELECT pgd.product_code_id FROM elp_product_group pg, elp_product_group_detail pgd WHERE pg.product_group_id = pgd.product_group_id and pg.dealer_id = :dealer_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_PRODUCTGROUPID_PRODUCTCODEID: SELECT PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_GROUP_ID, PRODUCT_CODE_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL WHERE PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = :PRODUCT_GROUP_ID AND PRODUCT_CODE_ID = :PRODUCT_CODE_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_product_group_detail SET product_code_id = :product_code_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE product_group_detail_id = :product_group_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_product_group_detail ( product_group_id, product_code_id ) VALUES ( :product_group_id, :product_code_id )
